QuestData.Title: Full of Surprises
QuestData.Description:
You continue to surprise me Maw Walker, your presence here is most unexpected!
Since we are both here, I believe we should work together.
The Jailer has a vault full of valuables, somewhere in this rift. Locate it for me, or bring it here to be opened and we'll share the wealth together!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ve'nari, with or without Zovaal's Vault.
